Question: FORUM8 Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
FORUM8 Co., Ltd.

Metaverse System

 - Theme: "Sustainability realized via Cloud"
 - Attracted many visitors at CES 2023

UC-1 Series

 - Civil engineering/architectural design software products
 - Includes various CAD systems for design calculations
 - Solutions encompass electronic delivery and sustainable management

3D Visual Interactive Simulation

 - Specialization in driver training and transportation applications
 - Used for urban planning projects
 - Supports cloud-based stakeholder collaborations
Summary_cn:
福龙八公司

元宇宙系统

 - 主题：“通过云实现可持续性”
 - 在2023年CES展览上吸引了许多观众

UC-1 系列

 - 用于土木工程和建筑设计的软件产品
 - 包括各种CAD系统用于设计计算
 - 解决方案包括电子交付和可持续管理

3D 视觉互动模拟

 - 专注于驾驶员培训和交通应用
 - 用于城市规划项目
 - 支持基于云的利益相关者协作
